Name: Fortification: tower defence
About the game: Co-op Tower Defense. Build towers, defend the missile silo, from the invasion of robots who want to exterminate humanity. Features Generate terrain: Each match lasts 20-40 min 7 types of weapons. Technology research: Co-op with friends up to 6 players
